name: YCSYOB
description:
"You can see your own butt"

This is a prototype of a 3D version of Asteroids, using Raymarching on Signed Distance Fields in order to capture the screen-wrapping effect from classic 2D Asteroids.

Controls:

  • Mouse to look
  • Left Click to shoot
  • WASD to accelerate
  • B to toggle self-visibility
  • P to toggle disco mode
  • Escape to quit

Note: the rendering tech used might be very graphics-intensive. To reduce strain, you can reduce the resolution in ycsyob_settings.ini
You can also set downscaleFactor to a number higher than 1, to render at a lower resolution internally.
